item.title: Use Case Diagram
item.description: Intro Use Case Diagrams are used to visualize different types of users in a system and how those users interact with the system. It provides a higher-level view of the system. A single use case diagram captures a particular functionality of a system. So to model the entire system, a few major use cases are used. A Use case diagram should not go deep into the details of use cases rather it should be easily understood by any non-technical person.
